description:
`furo-ui5-bool-icon`
Displays a icon/symbol for a boolean value

This component uses utf-8 symbols for true and false at the moment.

```html
<furo-ui5-bool-icon Æ’-bind-data="--FieldNode"></furo-ui5-bool-icon>
```

Only `@ui5/webcomponents-icons/dist/navigation-down-arrow.js` and `@ui5/webcomponents-icons/dist/navigation-right-arrow.js` are imported.
If you set other icons, please do not forget to import them.
name: FuroDataBoolIcon

members.name: bindData
members.description: Binds a field node to the component

members.name: symboltrue
members.description: Defines the icon for the true state.

members.name: symbolfalse
members.description: Defines the icon for the false state.

attributes.name: symboltrue
attributes.description: Defines the icon for the true state.

attributes.name: symbolfalse
attributes.description: Defines the icon for the false state.

summary: Displays a icon/symbol for a boolean value
